synopsis.text: Tendou Akira, a 24-year-old corporate slave, has hit rock bottom. His once promising life, filled with academic achievements and rugby accolades, has been reduced to a monotonous cycle of overtime and sleepless nights. Trapped in an oppressive company, he's lost his spark and the courage to confess his feelings to his beautiful coworker. But when a zombie outbreak sweeps through Japan, Akira finds an unexpected silver lining amidst the chaos. With the corporate shackles broken, he embarks on a thrilling quest to complete a bucket list of 100 tasks before he joins the ranks of the undead. Surrounded by the living dead, Akira has never felt more alive!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
